items.prompt: Match the adjective with its meaning:
items.explanation: These adjectives are essential for describing modern financial services.

items.prompt: I like this app. It is very ______ and easy to understand.
items.explanation: User-friendly means something is easy for the user.

items.prompt: This is a ______ bank. It has many physical branches.
items.explanation: Traditional banks often have many physical offices.

items.prompt: Our new banking system is very [blank]. The transfers are instant.
Is your password ______? Yes, I use 12 characters.
items.explanation: A long password makes your account more secure.

items.prompt: Write a sentence to describe a new computer using the adjective 'fast'.
items.example: The new computer is very fast.
items.explanation: Put the adjective after 'is' or before the noun.

items.prompt: Role-play: You are helping a friend with a new banking app. Say: 'This app is very user-friendly' and 'It is very secure'.
items.scenario: Showing a friend a new Fintech app.
suggestedPhrases: It is faster than the old bank.

items.prompt: That ______ office only has two desks.
We need a [blank] meeting room for 50 people.
items.explanation: Large is the opposite of small.

items.prompt: The internet is very ______ today. I can't open the app.
items.explanation: Slow internet makes it difficult to use apps.

items.prompt: Reorder the sentence:
items.sentence: This is a new credit card
items.explanation: Esta es una tarjeta de crédito nueva.

items.prompt: Those ______ computers are from 2010.
items.explanation: Old describes something from the past.

items.prompt: This ATM is very [blank]. It is from last week.
items.explanation: New means it was recently made.

items.prompt: Is that a ______ wallet? No, it is small.
items.explanation: Large is the opposite of small.

items.prompt: Reorder the sentence:
items.sentence: The bank is very busy today
items.explanation: El banco está muy concurrido hoy.

items.prompt: Translate to English: 'Nuestra oficina es muy moderna.'
This connection is ______ (safe).
items.explanation: Secure is a synonym for safe in technology.

items.prompt: The manager is very [blank] today.
items.explanation: Busy means having a lot to do.

items.prompt: Reorder the sentence:
A neobank is a ______ bank.
